A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson takes Star Wars and is able to add something fresh to it while still maintaining the Star Wars feel. Most engaging film I've seen since the Original Trilogy. It is not entirely perfect\, but it's a fun movie that has a lot of meaning and purpose behind it. \n\nOne of my favorite quotes from the film\, \"Let the past die. Kill it if you must. That's the only way you can become who you're meant to be.\"
